text: Roddy Alberto Zambrano Olmedo (born 3 February 1978) is an Ecuadorian professional football referee.Profile He has been a full international for FIFA since 2012.FIFA. "Ecuador: Referees". He refereed matches in Copa Libertadores and at the 2019 Copa America. == References == Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian football referees Category:People from Manabí Province
title: Roddy Zambrano
